doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff

[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 41 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 158[Air Date: 7/8/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 41 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 158[Air Date: 7/8/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Gay Pride Run 1985 - Front Runners2. Gay Friends and Neighbors, BrooklynCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp3. Police and Gay All-Stars, softballCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlaine and Associates: Career Service Professionals4. Andy Humm reporting on Gay Pride March5. Candlelight March, AIDS memorial on Christopher Street7. Dallas, Texas Report8. Heathline: AIDS Conference at Hunter College, June 1985, excerpt from key speaker Nathan Fain
The Right Stuff:1. Current Events with Brandon JudellCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" magazine2. Sybil Ophthalmia Bruncheon - "Picnic on the West Side Piers, with gifts"COMMERCIAL: Arcos Blancos Resort, Puerto Rico3. Broadway Confidential: Michael Thomas Lord reviews "Vampire Lesbians of Sodom," "Leader of the Pack"
